workflow.name: Automate property maintenance requests with GPT-4o-mini, Jotform and Gmail
workflow.description:
Tired of juggling maintenance calls, lost requests, and slow vendor responses?
This workflow streamlines the entire property maintenance process ‚Äî from tenant request to vendor dispatch ‚Äî powered by AI categorization and automated communication.

Cut resolution time from 5‚Äì7 days to under 24 hours and boost tenant satisfaction by 85% with zero manual follow-up.

## What This Workflow Does

Transforms chaotic maintenance management into seamless automation:

üìù Captures Requests ‚Äì Tenants submit issues via Jotform with unit number, issue description, urgency, and photos.

ü§ñ AI Categorization ‚Äì OpenAI (GPT-4o-mini) analyzes and classifies issues (plumbing, HVAC, electrical, etc.).

‚öôÔ∏è Smart Prioritization ‚Äì Flags emergencies (leak, electrical failure) and assigns priority.

üì¨ Vendor Routing ‚Äì Routes issue to the correct contractor or vendor based on AI category.

üìß Automated Communication ‚Äì Sends acknowledgment to tenant and work order to vendor via Gmail.

üìä Audit Trail Logging ‚Äì Optionally logs requests in Google Sheets for performance tracking and reporting.

## Key Features

üß† AI-Powered Categorization ‚Äì Intelligent issue type and priority detection.

üö® Emergency Routing ‚Äì Automatically escalates critical issues.

üì§ Automated Work Orders ‚Äì Sends detailed emails with property and tenant info.

üìà Google Sheets Logging ‚Äì Transparent audit trail for compliance and analytics.

üîÑ End-to-End Automation ‚Äì From form submission to vendor dispatch in seconds.

üí¨ Sticky Notes Included ‚Äì Every section annotated for easy understanding.

## Perfect For

1. Property management companies

2. Real estate agencies and facility teams

3. Smart building operators

4. Co-living and rental startups

5. Maintenance coordinators managing 50‚Äì200+ requests monthly

## What You‚Äôll Need

Required Integrations:

1. Jotform ‚Äì Maintenance request form
Create your form for free on [Jotform using this link](https://www.jotform.com/?partner=mediajade)

2. OpenAI (GPT-4o-mini) ‚Äì Categorization and prioritization

3. Gmail ‚Äì Automated email notifications

4. (Optional) Google Sheets ‚Äì Logging and performance tracking

## Quick Start

1. Import Template ‚Äì Copy JSON into n8n and import.

2. Create Jotform ‚Äì Include fields:
Tenant name, email, unit number, issue description, urgency, photo upload.

3. Add Credentials ‚Äì Configure Jotform, Gmail, and OpenAI credentials.

4. Set Vendor Emails ‚Äì Update ‚ÄúSend to Contractor‚Äù Gmail node with vendor email IDs.

5. Test Workflow ‚Äì Submit sample maintenance requests for AI categorization and routing.

6. Activate Workflow ‚Äì Go live and let your tenants submit maintenance issues.

## Expected Results

‚è±Ô∏è 24-hour average resolution time (vs 5‚Äì7 days).

üòÄ 85% higher tenant satisfaction with instant communication.

üìâ Zero lost requests ‚Äì every issue logged automatically.

üß† AI-driven prioritization ensures critical issues handled first.

üïí 10+ hours saved weekly for property managers.

## Pro Tips

üßæ Add Google Sheets logging for a complete audit trail.

üîî Include keywords like ‚Äúleak,‚Äù ‚Äúno power,‚Äù or ‚Äúurgent‚Äù in AI prompts for faster emergency detection.

üß∞ Expand vendor list dynamically using a Google Sheet lookup.

üßë‚Äçüîß Add follow-up automation to verify task completion from vendors.

üìä Create dashboards for monthly maintenance insights.

## Learning Resources

This workflow demonstrates:

1. AI categorization using OpenAI‚Äôs Chat Model (GPT-4o-mini)

2. Multi-path routing logic (emergency vs. normal)

3. Automated communication via Gmail

4. Optional data logging in Google Sheets

5. Annotated workflow with Sticky Notes for learning clarity

options.systemMessage: You are an expert property maintenance coordinator with 20+ years of experience in residential and commercial property management. You understand emergency protocols, vendor capabilities, legal requirements, and cost optimization.

parameters.subject: =üö® EMERGENCY WORK ORDER - {{ $json.workOrderNumber }}
=Work Order: {{ $json.workOrderNumber }} - {{ $json.issueCategory }}
=‚úÖ Maintenance Request Received - {{ $('Parse Request Data').item.json.requestId }}

parameters.content:
üì© **TRIGGER: Maintenance Request**

Captures tenant maintenance requests via Jotform:

**Required Fields:**
‚Ä¢ Tenant name, email, phone
‚Ä¢ Unit number & property address
‚Ä¢ Issue description (long text)
‚Ä¢ Urgency level (dropdown)
‚Ä¢ Photo upload
‚Ä¢ Access instructions
‚Ä¢ Preferred contact method

**Form Setup:**
Create form at [JotForm](https://www.jotform.com/?partner=mediajade)

**Field Types:**
- Single line text
- Email
- Phone number
- Long text (description)
- Dropdown (urgency: emergency, urgent, normal)
- File upload (photo)
- Textarea (access info)

üßæ **PARSE REQUEST DATA**

Normalizes maintenance request from Jotform.

Handles various field formats and creates standardized request object.

Generates unique request ID for tracking.

ü§ñ **AI MAINTENANCE ANALYSIS**

**Advanced AI Agent categorizes and prioritizes:**

‚úÖ **Issue Categorization**
- Primary category (plumbing, electrical, HVAC, etc.)
- Secondary sub-categories
- Confidence scoring

‚úÖ **Priority Assessment**
- Emergency keywords detection
- Safety concern flagging
- Habitability issue identification
- Legal compliance checking

‚úÖ **Vendor Recommendation**
- Optimal contractor type
- Required specialization
- Urgency level for dispatch

‚úÖ **Complexity Analysis**
- Simple/moderate/complex/major
- Estimated hours
- Specialist requirement

‚úÖ **Cost Estimation**
- Budget range
- Cost factors

‚úÖ **Smart Communication**
- Tenant messaging
- Contractor instructions
- Safety protocols

‚úÖ **Preventive Intelligence**
- Recurring issue detection
- Warranty applicability
- Prevention recommendations

**AI Model:** GPT-4 for accuracy

üîó **EXTRACT AI RESPONSE**

Extracts structured JSON from AI Agent.

Prepares data for merging with request details.

üß© **MERGE AI ANALYSIS**

**Intelligent data fusion:**

‚Ä¢ Combines request with AI insights
‚Ä¢ Selects appropriate contractor from database
‚Ä¢ Generates work order number
‚Ä¢ Calculates priority scores
‚Ä¢ Handles parsing errors gracefully

**Contractor Database:**
- Plumber
- Electrician
- HVAC Technician
- Handyman
- Locksmith
- Pest Control
- General Contractor

Each with contact details for auto-routing!

‚ö° **EMERGENCY ROUTING**

Checks if issue is emergency priority.

**TRUE:** Sends urgent dispatch email
**FALSE:** Sends standard work order

Emergency emails include:
- Immediate response required
- Safety protocols highlighted
- Legal compliance notices
- Direct phone contact

üìß **CONTRACTOR DISPATCH**

**Emergency Email:**
üö® Immediate attention required
- All critical details
- Safety protocols
- Legal compliance notes
- Requires immediate ETA response

**Standard Work Order:**
üìã Comprehensive work order
- Complete AI analysis
- Contractor instructions
- Documentation requirements
- Preventive recommendations

Both include:
- Tenant contact info
- Access instructions
- Photo links
- Cost estimates
- AI insights

‚úâÔ∏è **TENANT CONFIRMATION**

**Professional acknowledgment email:**

‚úÖ Request received confirmation
‚úÖ AI analysis summary
‚úÖ Assigned contractor details
‚úÖ Estimated timeline
‚úÖ Temporary solutions (if applicable)
‚úÖ Safety notices (if relevant)
‚úÖ Habitability alerts (if urgent)
‚úÖ Emergency contact info
‚úÖ Update schedule

**Dynamic Content:**
- Emergency vs standard messaging
- Safety warnings when flagged
- Temp solutions from AI
- Recurring issue notifications

Builds trust with transparency!

üìä **GOOGLE SHEETS LOGGING**

**Main Request Log:**
Tracks all maintenance requests with:
- Request & work order IDs
- Tenant details
- Issue categorization
- AI analysis results
- Priority assessment
- Contractor assignment
- Cost estimates
- Status tracking

**Recurring Issues Tracker:**
Separate sheet for pattern analysis:
- Unit number
- Issue category
- Occurrence dates
- Preventive recommendations

**Analytics Ready:**
‚úì Response time metrics
‚úì Contractor performance
‚úì Cost analysis
‚úì Recurring issue identification
‚úì Tenant satisfaction tracking
‚úì AI accuracy measurement

Connect to Data Studio for dashboards!

user.name: Jitesh Dugar
user.bio: AI Automation Specialist - OpenAI, CRM & Automation Expert with a solid understanding of various tools that include Zapier, Make, Zoho CRM, Hubspot, Google Sheets, Airtable, Pipedrive, Google Analytics, and more.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
